detailsData.title: Quality Representation
detailsData.content: Our top priority is providing high-quality legal representation. This means that our personal injury lawyers will keep you informed and go the extra mile to get the compensation you need and deserve.

detailsData.title: Aggressive Advocacy
detailsData.content: We combine thorough, aggressive representation with personalized service for each of our clients. We seek the maximum compensation possible for lost income, medical bills and pain and suffering.

detailsData.title: Experienced Attorneys
detailsData.content: Our Pennsylvania attorneys have more than 100 years of combined experience. We have reputation for obtaining successful settlements and jury verdicts.

detailsData.title: No Fee Guarantee
detailsData.content: If we don’t receive a realistic settlement offer, we don't hesitate to take a case to trial. NO RECOVERY, NO FEE. GUARANTEED.

address: 1500 John F. Kennedy Blvd Suite Number 1410 Philadelphia, PA 19102
valueProp: Our Philly personal injury attorneys fight for clients, seeking the maximum compensation possible for lost income, medical bills and pain and suffering.

testimonalData.text: What impressed me the most was his ability to relate. He was always accessible whenever I called.
testimonalData.author: Willie Hamilton

testimonalData.text: I was a personal injury client in a trip-and-fall case. I received excellent representation, competent, fair and diligent in every way. They were very kind and easy to work with, I felt protected and well taken care of.
testimonalData.author: Tatiana ..

testimonalData.text: I chose MyPhillyLawyer to represent me for the car accident I was in, and I am very happy with my decision. Dean Weitzman and his team have my best interest at hand, and Leslie and Simone are always there to answer any questions I may have and to help me understand the process.
testimonalData.author: eric w.
